{{HistoryTable
|{{HistoryLine|java classic}}
|{{HistoryLine||0.26 SURVIVAL TEST|Double stone slabs have an unobtainable item form corresponding to its block ID.
|It can be obtained via inventory editors with numeric item ID 43.}}
|{{HistoryLine|java beta}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.6|dev=Test Build 3|Double stone slab items can be obtained from the newly added debug chests, mainly from the 12th slot of the 2nd chest from the left, and the 23rd slot of the 5th chest from the left.}}
|{{HistoryLine|||dev=release|Debug chests no longer spawn, preventing double stone slab items from being obtained this way.}}
|{{HistoryLine|java}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.0.0|dev=Beta 1.9 Prerelease 4|Double stone slabs can be obtained with the [[Silk Touch]] enchantment by breaking a block with an appropriate tool enchanted with it.}}
|{{HistoryLine|||dev=Beta 1.9 Prerelease 5|Double stone slabs can no longer be obtained via Silk Touch.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.3.1|dev=12w16a|Double slab items can now be obtained in singleplayer worlds via the {{cmd|give}} command using the respective numeric ID.}}
|{{HistoryLine|||dev=12w17a|Added wooden double slabs, which have an unobtainable item form corresponding to its block ID, which uses a full render. It can be obtained via the {{cmd|give}} command or inventory editors with numeric item ID 125.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.8|dev=14w25a|The direct item forms of double slabs have been removed from the game. They can no longer exist as items in any way, only as placed blocks.}}
|{{HistoryLine|pocket alpha}}
|{{HistoryLine||v0.1.0|Double stone slabs have an unobtainable item form corresponding to its block ID. It can be obtained via inventory editors or hex editors with numeric item ID 43 or hex value 2B.}}
|{{HistoryLine|Bedrock Edition}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.19.0|dev=beta 1.19.0.26|Smooth stone double slabs can be obtained via the /give command.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.21.20|dev=beta 1.21.10.22|Smooth stone double slabs can no longer be obtained via the /give command.}}
|{{HistoryLine|console}}
|{{HistoryLine||?|Double slab items exist.
|They have a tendency to crash the game<ref name="console">https://youtu.be/qtn9Nx3YpeU</ref>}}
}}
